Desc.entry: Open to any Christian who enjoys singing or playing an instrument, an ability to read music is not required. Term-time membership for students is welcomed. A regular commitment to attendance is expected as far as possible. The repertoire includes music of more contemporary composers from Britain and the USA, as well as from the Iona Community.

Langs.entry: Dutch, French, German, Spanish, and a variety of African languages

Address.entry: Roman Catholic Cathedral of St Marie

ContactName.entry: Philip Jakob, Director of Music, Cathedral and Diocese of Hallam

ProvisionPlace.entry: Roman Catholic Cathedral of St Marie
